entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Mirabel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 6:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 58 %

Dewpoint: -10.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
